wordpressPage.title: Budge – Youth Group Favourite!
wordpressPage.content:
This game is one of my groups favourites.

You need a big hall and some chairs to play this.

Make sure everyone in your group except two people are sat on chairs. These chairs can be randomly placed in a hall.

Out of the two young people without chairs one starts as the ‘chaser’ and one as the person being ‘chased’.

When the game starts the chaser tags the other person and if he/she tags them then they must switch rolls

At any point the person being chased can tag someone on a chair, yell ‘BUDGE’ and that person must give up their chair for the person being chased and take their place.

There’s no real way to end this game so a time limit is advisable!
